    • run

      public void run()
      Sets the current state based on the next requested state. If no state is requested, waits for a request. While a state is being rendered, requested states aren't applied: only the last requested state is applied, and only as soon as the current state has finished rendering.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • prompt

      public Optional<String> prompt​(String prompt, String defaultValue)
